original: @233b rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @233b rgya gar skad du /

original: sarba ta th'a ga ta aushn'a shi bi dza ya n'a ma dha ra n'i kalpa sa hi ta /
analyzed: sarba ta th'a ga ta aushn'a shi bi dza ya n'a ma dha ra n'i kalpa sa hi ta /

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa /
translated: The Dhāraṇī of the Uṣṇīṣa of All Tathāgatas, Called the Victorious, Together with Its Ritual

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard at one time.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa bde ba can gyis chos yang dag par sdud pa'i khang bzang mchog na nye bar bzhugs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa bde ba can gyis chos yang dag par sdud pa'i khang bzang mchog na nye bar bzhugs so //
translated: The Blessed One, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, Amitāyus, was dwelling in the supreme Dharmacakra assembly hall in Sukhāvatī.

original: de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then, looking upon the assembly, he addressed the noble Avalokiteśvara:

original: kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo sdug bsngal pa nad kyis yongs su gzir ba'i sems can tshe thung ba rnams yod de /
analyzed: kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo sdug bsngal pa nad kyis yongs su gzir ba'i sems can tshe thung ba rnams yod de /
translated: “O bodhisattva mahāsattva, son of noble family or daughter of noble family, there are beings who are suffering and afflicted by disease, and have short lives.

original: de rnams kyi phyir sems can thams cad la kun tu gzigs pa'i mtshan gyi dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyid 'chang ba dang / bklag pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir @234a *//
analyzed: de rnams kyi phyir sems can thams cad la kun tu gzigs pa'i mtshan gyi dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyid 'chang ba dang / bklag pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir @234a *//
translated: For their sake, in order to preserve this dhāraṇī called The Tathāgata’s Uṣṇīṣa Victory Banner, which is seen by all beings, and in order to ensure that it is upheld, read, and taught extensively to others,

original: yun ring por gnas par bsgrub pa'i ched du bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs te kun tu gzigs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
analyzed: yun ring por gnas par bsgrub pa'i ched du bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs te kun tu gzigs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
translated: the Blessed One, looking at the entire assembly, entered the samādhi called the splendor of the all-seeing one.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa /🔽aom na mo bha ga wa te sarba tree lo kya pra ti bi shisht'a ya /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa / aom na mo bha ga wa te sarba tree lo kya pra ti bi shisht'a ya /
translated: Oṃ, homage to the Blessed One, who is superior in all three worlds,

original: buddh'a ya te na ma:/
analyzed: buddh'a ya te na ma:/
translated: to the Buddha, I pay homage.🔽Tadyathā: Oṃ bhruṃ bhruṃ bhruṃ,

original: tadya th'a / aom bhr'um bhr'um bhr'um/
analyzed: tadya th'a / aom bhr'um bhr'um bhr'um/

original: sho dha ya sho dha ya /🔽bi sho dha ya bi sho dha ya /🔽aa sa ma sa ma manta aa ba bh'a sa spha ra na ga ti /🔽ga ga na sva bh'a ba bi shuddhe /🔽aushn'i sha bi dza ya pa ri shuddhe /🔽aa bhi shi nytsantu m'am/🔽sarba ta th'a ga ta su ga ta ba ra ba tsa na /🔽aa mri ta aa bhi shi kee ra /
analyzed: sho dha ya sho dha ya / bi sho dha ya bi sho dha ya / aa sa ma sa ma manta aa ba bh'a sa spha ra na ga ti / ga ga na sva bh'a ba bi shuddhe / aushn'i sha bi dza ya pa ri shuddhe / aa bhi shi nytsantu m'am/ sarba ta th'a ga ta su ga ta ba ra ba tsa na / aa mri ta aa bhi shi kee ra /

original: ma h'a mu dra mandra pa dee: sv'ah'a /
analyzed: ma h'a mu dra mandra pa dee: sv'ah'a /

original: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba /
analyzed: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba /
translated: This is the Tathāgata’s uṣṇīṣa, called the Victorious One, which purifies all misdeeds and obscurations,

original: ngan song thams cad rgyun gcod pa 'di yi ger bris te mchod rten gyi srog shing gi steng du bzhugs la zla ba nya ba'i tshe khrus byas te lan stong rtsa brgyad brjod na /
analyzed: ngan song thams cad rgyun gcod pa 'di yi ger bris te mchod rten gyi srog shing gi steng du bzhugs la zla ba nya ba'i tshe khrus byas te lan stong rtsa brgyad brjod na /
translated: and severs all lower rebirths. Write it down, place it on top of the life-tree of a stūpa, and on the full moon day, bathe, and recite it one thousand and eight times.

original: tshe zad pa las tshe phyir nur bar 'gyur ro //🔽ngan song las @235a *//
analyzed: tshe zad pa las tshe phyir nur bar 'gyur ro // ngan song las @235a *//
translated: If your life is exhausted, your life will be extended.🔽You will quickly be freed from lower rebirths,

original: myur du thar te sgrib pa rnams dag nas bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: myur du thar te sgrib pa rnams dag nas bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: and having purified your obscurations, you will attain unsurpassed awakening.

original: dud 'gro rnams kyis thos na yang de rnams ngan song gi tha ma yin te /🔽byang chub ma thob kyi bar du mtho ris rgyal po'i rigs sam /
analyzed: dud 'gro rnams kyis thos na yang de rnams ngan song gi tha ma yin te / byang chub ma thob kyi bar du mtho ris rgyal po'i rigs sam /
translated: If animals hear it, they will be reborn in the future as humans.

original: bram ze'i rigs sam /🔽tshong dpon gyi rigs sam /
analyzed: bram ze'i rigs sam / tshong dpon gyi rigs sam /
translated: Until they attain awakening, they will be reborn in the higher realms, in a royal family,🔽in a priestly family,🔽in a merchant family,

original: khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: or in a household as wealthy as the great sāla tree.

original: mchod rten de'i grib mas phog gam /
analyzed: mchod rten de'i grib mas phog gam /
translated: Even if the shadow of that stūpa falls on them,

original: rdul gyis btab kyang rung ste ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdul gyis btab kyang rung ste ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: or even if dust from it blows on them, they will not go to the lower realms.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid rangs te mngon par bstod do ////
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid rangs te mngon par bstod do ////
translated: When the Blessed One had said this, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Ārya Avalokiteśvara rejoiced and praised it.

original: 'phags pa gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas ba rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas ba rdzogs so ////
translated: The noble Uṣṇīṣavijayā Dhāraṇī with its story is complete.
